title: Germany considers charges against Facebook for hate speech
text:
Germany considers charges against Facebook for hate speech 
Miami Herald Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Chastened by its Nazi past, Germany long ago banned incitement of racial hatred Refugees crisis has prompted posts that many feel violate those lawsPosters have been charged, and Facebook officials might be 
...
